detectors.description:
Token.unlocked() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Vesting__6.sol#331-336) uses a Boolean constant improperly:
	-locked (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Vesting__6.sol#332)

Vesting.noGrantExistsForUser(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Vesting__6.sol#450-453) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(tokenGrants[_user].startTime == 0,colony-token-user-grant-exists) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Vesting__6.sol#451)

Reentrancy in Vesting.addTokenGrant(address,uint256,uint128,uint16,uint16) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Vesting__6.sol#473-496):
	External calls:
	- token.transferFrom(colonyMultiSig,address(this),_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Vesting__6.sol#483)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenGrants[_recipient] = grant (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Vesting__6.sol#494)
